snippet.title: Borderlands 2 - Come and Get Me Trailer
snippet.description:
Stop Handsome Jack from taking over Pandora!  Only the new vault hunters with the help of the original from Borderlands 1 can stop him now!

Pre-order at select retailers to get into the Borderlands 2 Premiere Club to unlock exclusive digital content for your characters!

Come hang out on the Official Borderlands Forums - http://gbxforums.gearboxsoftware.com/
Follow us out on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gearboxsoftware
Follow our publisher on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/2KGames
Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BorderlandsGame
